author: fhanik
msg: First working version of the simple TCP clustering, still has way to go, but I wanted it to get
into the repository so that I can formally work on it under revision control

author: fhanik
msg: Old replication, should not be there

author: jfarcand
msg: Fix bug introduced by myself. The forward information must be based on the original request, not on the forwarded one. Thanks to Jan for pointing the problem.

author: luehe
msg: Invoking session.invalidate() after setting max inactive interval to 0
The reason for this failure has been that setMaxInactiveInterval does not
expire the session immediately if the 'interval' argument equals 0.

author: luehe
msg: Only in the case of the forward (not include!) method of the
RequestDispatcher must the path elements of the request object
(including queryString) exposed to the target servlet reflect the path
used to obtain the RequestDispatcher (in the case of the include
method, the path elements of the original request are preserved).
